description: Staying warm is the key to ensuring that every outdoor adventure is fun. That’s why having a good hat is imperative. The Kids’ Isto Beanie offers the thermoregulation and cozy softness of responsibly sourced Merino wool and the durability of recycled nylon. Plus, with multicolored yarns and a fun pom, it brings a hint of playfulness to any occasion. Here’s to warm noggins!
name: Isto Beanie - Kids

specs.value: 48% Merino Wool, 43% Recycled Nylon, 9% Recycled Polyester. Exclusive of Decoration
